Articles.Content: I'm in orbit around Kerbin and sure, it looks freakin' awesome, but about half the stars are sparkling. My understanding is that doesn't happen when outside the atmosphere (admittedly, I've never been outside the atmosphere but... ) I do love the effect - maybe add a toggle for that?
I actually wondered if this was an aliasing bug. What resolution and settings are you using?
That's actually right. But it may be a poetic licence (cause it's beautiful, even if inaccurate)
